column4: Hi, I'm trying to use me Bluetooth headset with Ubuntu 11.04. Pairing and connection to the device works, but I can not find any way to transfer the sound to the headset within the Sound preferences dialog.
in the hardware tab of sound preferences do you see bluetooth listed?
that's certainly an issue then.  Sorry, I got nothing - BT either worked OOTB or I had no success with it.  Best of luck.
